shortdesc.ph: Sets subscription options for remote video streams.
Sets the options for subscribing to remote video streams.

p.codeblock: virtual int setRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptions(uid_t uid, const VideoSubscriptionOptions &options) = 0;
public abstract int setRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptions(int uid, VideoSubscriptionOptions options);

section.p:
When the remote user enables dual-stream mode, you can call this method to configure the subscription options for the video stream sent by that user. The SDK's default behavior for subscribing to remote video streams depends on the type of video observer registered:
If is registered, the SDK subscribes to both raw and encoded data by default.
If is registered, the SDK subscribes to only encoded data by default.
If both observers are registered, the default behavior follows the last registered observer. For example, if is registered last, the SDK subscribes to both raw and encoded data. If you want to change the default behavior or set different subscription options for different user IDs, you can use this method.

You can call this method to set the subscription options for the video stream sent by a remote user. This is applicable when the remote user enables dual-stream mode. The SDK's default subscription behavior depends on the type of registered video observer:
If is registered, the SDK subscribes to both raw and encoded data by default.
If is registered, the SDK subscribes only to encoded data by default.
If both observers are registered, the default behavior follows the last registered observer. For example, if is registered last, the SDK subscribes to both raw and encoded data by default. If you want to change the default behavior or set different subscription options for different user IDs, you can call this method.

plentry.pd: The user ID of the remote user.
User ID of the remote user.
